name: Angel Robe
special: Protects against status and nullifies elemental damage.

name: Bone Mail
special: Halves damage from Ice, doubles damage from Fire and Holy. Healing wearer instead deals damage. Death fully restores wearer. Killed, Life-restoring items and spells do not work (not quite Zombie status).
Increases the strength of elemental attacks by 50%.
name: Gaia Gear

special: Adds one Image to the wearer at the start of battle.
name: Mirage Vest
Rainbow Dress
special: Boosts rate of Sword Dance when using !Dance, increases the success rate of !Flirt

name: Gold Hairpin
special: Halves the wearer's cost of casting spells.
Prevents statuses, increases the chance of Sword Dance appearing for a Dancer. Boosts the success rate of !Flirt.
name: Lamia's Tiara
Aegis Shield
special: Has a 33% chance of blocking a magical attack, protects against status.
Raises power of all elemental attacks except Water
name: Chaos Orb
Coral Ring
special: Absorbs Water, immune to Fire, weak against Lightning
Grants a 33% chance of evading physical attacks
name: Elven Mantle

special: Absorbs Fire, immune to Ice, weak against Water
name: Flame Ring
Kaiser Knuckles
special: Increases Attack by 50 if no weapon is equipped while using Barehanded.

name: Conago Jr
special: Increases HP requirement for successful !Catch from 12.5% to 50%
Increases chance of Swords Dance from 25% to 50%. Removes chance of Tempting Tango. Boosts the success rate of !Flirt.
name: Red Slippers
Thief's Gloves
special: Doubles chances of obtaining an item with !Steal or !Mug
